text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes Keep working to convict Bidens, Clintons, Obamas, + the hundreds of other corrupt politicians, investigate the Chinese for the source of coronavirus, bring back 50% of manufacturing by following my suggestion in the letter I sent, publish your tax return.
